translation.en: ♪ Hey ♪
- ♪ This place is hot… ♪ - That's not good.
What are you doing, Captain?
I think it's pretty obvious. I'm stealing this jet.
translation.es: Creo que es obvio que estoy robando este caza.

translation.en: I think it's pretty obvious you're trying to.
translation.es: Es obvio que lo estás intentando.

translation.en: - You know I can track your jump. - Yeah, but you know that I know that.
translation.es: Puedo rastrear tu salto. Y sabes que sé eso, así que uno de nosotros no sabe algo.

translation.en: So one of us doesn't know something else, right?
translation.es: Y sabes que sé eso, así que uno de nosotros no sabe algo.

translation.en: Ma'am, he's initiated wormhole sequencing.
translation.es: Va a crear un agujero de gusano.

translation.en: Adam, I want you to listen very carefully.
translation.es: Adam, quiero que me escuches muy bien.

translation.en: If you don't abort right now, I will shoot you out of the--
translation.es: Si no abortas de inmediato, te dispararé y…

translation.en: I'm sorry to interrupt what I'm sure is gonna be a scary threat,
but if I'm right, your tracking system is about to…
translation.es: pero creo que tu sistema debería estar por…

translation.en: - …crash. - ♪ We made it, baby ♪
- ♪ Gimme some lovin' ♪ - ♪ Gimme some lovin' ♪
- Okay, let's not die! -
Adam!
I'm gonna kill you!
Reed!
Oh no. I'm so sorry.
That's my bad. Hi.
- No. - Okay. Bye!
Reed! Get your ass back here.
- Got anything else you wanna say? - Actually, I--
- - Huh? No more jokes?
- Oh, I'm gonna enjoy this. - Who talks like that?
translation.es: - Voy a disfrutar esto. - ¿Quién habla así?

translation.en: Did you order, like, a Bully Starter Kit on Amazon or somethin'?
translation.es: ¿Compraste un kit de matones en Amazon o algo?

translation.en: I mean, do you even hear yourself? Chuck, we talked about this.
translation.es: ¿Has escuchado cómo suenas? Chuck, ya hablamos de esto.

translation.en: - I didn't say anything. - Shut up, Chuck.
There will be an assembly in the gymnasium now.
translation.es: Habrá una reunión en el gimnasio.

translation.en: Please proceed to the gymnasium.
Not a word.
See his face?
And, what, you're gonna suspend Adam? Because what? You think he started a fight with that thug Ray?
translation.es: ¿Y piensa suspenderlo porque cree que él empezó la pelea con ese matón?

translation.en: Was it Ray Dollarhyde again?
It's barely been a year since we lost his father.
translation.es: Perdió a su padre hace apenas un año.

translation.en: You could show some compassion.
It wasn't my fault.
I know you, Adam. I know that mouth of yours. I know exactly what got you punched.
translation.es: Sé cómo hablas, Adam. Sé bien por qué te golpeó.

translation.en: He was giving me crap in front of the whole class.
translation.es: Me estaba molestando frente a todos. Tenía que hacer algo.

translation.en: - I couldn't just take it. - He's twice your size.
translation.es: Me estaba molestando frente a todos. Tenía que hacer algo. Es más grande que tú.

translation.en: Everyone is twice my size. I've seen babies bigger than me.
translation.es: Todos lo son. He visto bebés más grandes que yo.

translation.en: - I don't understand you. - Dad would.
translation.es: No te entiendo. Papá lo haría.

translation.en: What's going on, honey? Can you just tell me?
If I keep having to leave work in the middle of the day, I'm gonna lose my job.
translation.es: Me terminarán despidiendo si sigo yéndome así del trabajo.

translation.en: It's the third time you've been suspended for fighting.
You'd think I'd be better at it by now.
This goes on your permanent record. Get that? Care about your future?
translation.es: Esto quedará en tu historial. ¿Te importa tu futuro?

translation.en: Do you?
Son, you'd better start caring, because the future is coming,
translation.es: Hijo, debería importarte porque el futuro llegará antes de lo que crees.

translation.en: sooner than you think.
translation.es: porque el futuro llegará antes de lo que crees.

translation.en: Hey, Adam.
Adam, I'm headed out.
Come and have your dinner.
Where you goin'?
Oh, just out to dinner with a friend.
translation.es: Saldré a cenar con un amigo.

translation.en: Which friend?
- His name's Derek. We work together. - You're goin' on a date.
translation.es: Derek, mi colega. Es una cita.

translation.en: - Not a date. I don't think it's a date. - Your dress thinks it is.
translation.es: No creo que sea una cita. Tu vestido sí lo cree.

translation.en: Oh, it is a date. I am going on a date. Why am I going on a date?
translation.es: Voy a tener una cita. ¿Por qué tendré una cita?

translation.en: Can we please stop saying date now? Thanks.
Adam, I'm sorry. We… we should have spoken about this.
translation.es: Adam, lo siento. Deberíamos haber hablado del tema.

translation.en: I don't know how to handle it. Let's talk about it now.
translation.es: No sé cómo lidiar con esto. Hablemos ahora.

translation.en: - Dear God, no. - No! You can have any kind of feeling.
translation.es: - Cielos, no. - Está bien que sientas cosas.

translation.en: - It's normal. As long as we're a team-- -
Oh! Time to go.
He texted me?
Well, look at that.
It's a whole new world.
translation.es: Es un mundo nuevo. Pero conversaremos más tarde.

translation.en: - But we will talk about it tonight, honey. - Mom, wait.
translation.es: Es un mundo nuevo. Pero conversaremos más tarde. Mamá, espera.

translation.en: - What? - Turn around.
- Make good choices, okay? - Said the boy who got suspended.
translation.es: - Toma buenas decisiones. - Dice el suspendido.

translation.en: I love you, honey.
I love you too, Mom. More than I know.
translation.es: Yo también, más de lo que imagino.

translation.en: Listen, while I'm out, lock up the back.
translation.es: Cierra la puerta de atrás mientras no estoy.

translation.en: No ovens, no answering the door, no video games.
translation.es: No uses el horno, no abras la puerta ni juegues videojuegos.

translation.en: Hawking?
What is it? You see something?
- - Hawking, stop! Hawking!
Hawking!
Whoa!
- - Oh my God. You scared the crap out of me.
- - Who's there?
I don't think we should be out here.
We're okay.
- - Hawking!
Take it easy.
- Or, you know, fall down and scream. -
- Jeez. Who the hell are you? - Put the bat down.
Put the bat down. I'm not gonna hurt you, I promise.
translation.es: - Baja el bate. - ¿Quién eres? No te lastimaré.

translation.en: - What are you doing in here? - Mostly bleeding.
Wait, how old are you?
- What? - How old are you?
Twelve.
Twelve…
Shit!
- How did you get in my dad's garage? - I… It was open.
No, it wasn't. And that is a flight suit. Are you a pilot?
translation.es: No, estaba cerrado. Y eso es un traje aéreo. ¿Eres piloto?

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, listen to me. Uh--
Don't-- Hey, don't call anyone. Put the phone down. I won't hurt you.
translation.es: No llames a nadie. Suelta el teléfono. No te lastimaré.

translation.en: You said that already.
- Well, it bears-- God damn it! -
Uh, it bears repeating. - - That's a lot of blood.
translation.es: - Vale la pena repetirlo. - Es mucha sangre.

translation.en: Well… well, I have so much more in my body. Where's your mother?
translation.es: Bueno, todavía me queda bastante. ¿Dónde está tu mamá?

translation.en: On a date.
With who?
- What? - With who? What's his name?
- I don't know. Derek? - Derek?
Derek. Derek, Derek, Derek. That's, yes, the guy with the, um… with the mouth mullet.
translation.es: Derek. Sí, ese es el tipo con la barbilla velluda.

translation.en: - The goatee? - Yeah.
So say goatee.
- Yeah, he doesn't matter. - None of them matter.
translation.es: - Él no importa. - Ninguno de ellos importa.

translation.en: Nice dog.
I'm gonna go inside the house.
translation.es: Voy a entrar a la casa.

translation.en: I'm gonna get some stuff.
Hey, careful with that.
- Stay here. -
Ah…
Told you to stay in the garage.
And let some creepy dude just wander around my house alone?
translation.es: ¿Y dejar que un tipo raro se pasee solo por mi casa?

translation.en: - Yeah… - I don't think so.
Yeah, believe me. I don't wanna be here any more than you want me here.
translation.es: Bueno, ni tú ni yo queremos que siga aquí.

translation.en: I just gotta stop bleeding long enough.
Gotta dress the wound, prevent a nasty infection,
translation.es: Me vendaré la herida, evitaré una infección grave

translation.en: and I will be on my merry way.
Don't touch that.
- I was just looking. - Don't touch my stuff.
translation.es: - Solo miraba. - No toques mis cosas.

translation.en: - Is this a lightsaber? - No, it's not.
- Okay. - No. Enough with the bat!
translation.es: Bien. Y olvida el bate, ¿bien? De haber querido, ya te hubiera lastimado.

translation.en: - - If I wanted to hurt you, I would have.
translation.es: Y olvida el bate, ¿bien? De haber querido, ya te hubiera lastimado.

translation.en: If I'm being honest with myself, you have a very punchable face.
translation.es: Siendo sincero, tienes una cara bastante golpeable.

translation.en: - Oh my-- - God! That--
Gah! That bullet went straight through. Good. - Cool. - Wait, wait, wait. Bullet? You were shot?
translation.es: - Bien, la bala me atravesó. - ¿Qué? ¿Te dispararon?

translation.en: Yeah-- No, actually, no.
No, I was stabbed with a bullet. What do you think, you moron?
translation.es: No, me apuñalaron con una bala. ¿Qué crees, tonto?

translation.en: - I'm a moron? You're the one who was shot. - All right, okay, that's it.
translation.es: Bueno, a ti te dispararon. Está bien.

translation.en: - - That… Wow… That, uh…
That's weird. It farts when I cough.
translation.es: Qué raro. Suena como un pedo cuando toso.

translation.en: - Gross. - Super gross.
I'm gonna go upstairs, grab some stuff. Stay cool. You can trust me.
translation.es: Iré por unas cosas. No te preocupes. Puedes confiar en mí.

translation.en: Easy for you to say. I'm the one who ends up in a therapist's office,
translation.es: Es fácil para ti decirlo. Yo soy el que terminará en terapia diciendo dónde me tocaron.

translation.en: telling them about where the bad man touched me.
translation.es: Yo soy el que terminará en terapia diciendo dónde me tocaron.

translation.en: Oh God! That's where you go? Immediately? You are dark, man.
translation.es: ¡Cielos! ¿Bromeas de inmediato con eso? ¡Qué humor más negro tienes!

translation.en: - Who even are you? - That is classified.
Why are you here?
- Also classi… classified. - Are you in the air force?
translation.es: - Eso también lo es. - ¿Estás en la Fuerza Aérea?

translation.en: When I say classified, what does your brain hear? Chocolate?
- What's with the lightsaber? - It's not a lightsaber.
translation.es: - ¿Y el sable de luz? - No es un sable.

translation.en: Jesus Christ, Adam. - I need you to play it cool. - Wait.
translation.es: Por Dios, Adam, necesito que te calmes.

translation.en: - I know playing it cool isn't your thing. - Wait.
translation.es: Sé que no es tu especialidad. Nunca la fue y…

translation.en: - It never has been-- - Wait, wait! How do you know my name?
translation.es: Sé que no es tu especialidad. Nunca la fue y… Espera, ¿cómo sabes mi nombre?

translation.en: You're Adam Reed. Born February 10th, 2010.
translation.es: Eres Adam Reed. Naciste el 10 de febrero del 2010.

translation.en: Your parents are Ellie and Louis Reed. Louis would've died about a year ago.
translation.es: Tus padres son Ellie y Louis Reed. Louis murió hace un año.

translation.en: You don't play any sports because of acute asthma.
translation.es: No practicas deportes porque tienes asma.

translation.en: - Plus you're freakishly small for 12. -
translation.es: Y eres muy pequeño para tener 12.

translation.en: You go to Franklin Middle School,
where you've been suspended two, three times for fighting,
translation.es: donde te suspendieron tres veces por pelear,

translation.en: which is ironic because you can't fight to save your life.
translation.es: lo cual es irónico porque eres terrible para pelear.

translation.en: Hawking! Zip it!
How do you know my dog's name?
Because I named him.
translation.es: Porque yo le puse ese nombre.

translation.en: - Where are you goin'? -
- - Oh God.
All right.
Here, ready? Deep breath.
Hold it.
Three, two, one.
Everybody gets a trophy.
When I was seven,
I ran into a table on the patio.
translation.es: choqué contra una mesa en el jardín.

translation.en: I got 12 stitches.
Right here.
You knew how to get into my dad's garage.
translation.es: Sabías cómo entrar al garaje de papá.

translation.en: You knew how to close the fridge.
You knew how to time my breathing.
We have the same scar.
And you're wearing my dad's watch.
translation.es: Y estás usando el reloj de mi papá.

translation.en: This watch.
This watch.
You're me.
Holy shi--
That's classified. But yes…
I once was.
I can't believe you're future me.
translation.es: No puedo creer que seas mi yo del futuro.

translation.en: Okay, you came to terms with that pretty quickly. It's a little disturbing, actually.
translation.es: Lo aceptaste bastante rápido. De hecho, es un poco alarmante.

translation.en: - So why are you here? - Rescue mission.
translation.es: - ¿A qué viniste? - A hacer un rescate.

translation.en: I wasn't supposed to land here. I was aiming for 2018.
translation.es: Se supone que debía volver al 2018.

translation.en: - I need to get there as soon as possible. - Who were you trying to save in 2018?
translation.es: - Debo llegar pronto. - ¿A quién quieres salvar en 2018?

translation.en: Really?
Fine. Can you at least tell me how you got here?
translation.es: Bien. ¿Al menos me dices cómo llegaste?

translation.en: I'll show ya.
What was that?
- Crap. - What?
Uh, we're gonna switch to plan A, which is where you come in.
translation.es: Cambiaremos al plan A, que es donde entras tú.

translation.en: You see, time jets, like all tech in the future, is coded to its user's DNA.
translation.es: Los cazas temporales y otras cosas están codificadas al ADN del usuario.

translation.en: Because I'm injured… aah, the jet won't even clear me to fly,
translation.es: Como estoy herido, el caza no me autorizará para volar,

translation.en: which means I can't get in there to fix her.
But guess who can?
There she is.
Away we go.
Okay. Sit down.
- Oh my God. - Yeah, yeah, yeah. Sit down.
Let's see what we're dealing with here. All right, some minor shield damage.
translation.es: Veamos qué pasa. Daños en el escudo, pérdida de refrigerante.

translation.en: - Coolant leaks. -
translation.es: Daños en el escudo, pérdida de refrigerante.

translation.en: I don't know what that is, but when is a flashing red light ever good?
translation.es: No sé qué es eso, pero no debe ser bueno.

translation.en: I know you wanna touch all the pretty buttons
translation.es: Sé que quieres tocar todos los botones con tus dedos pegajosos de niño,

translation.en: with your sticky little child fingers, but the reactor has a quantum signature.
translation.es: Sé que quieres tocar todos los botones con tus dedos pegajosos de niño, pero el reactor deja un rastro cuántico.

translation.en: You fire it up, they can find us. If they're here.
translation.es: Si lo enciendes, pueden encontrarnos… si están aquí.

translation.en: Who are they?
I'm glad that you didn't ask me that because they are classified.
translation.es: Qué bueno que no preguntaste, porque es confidencial.

translation.en: - I already know you're from the future. - Believe me, I regret that.
translation.es: Ya sé que eres del futuro. Y me arrepiento de eso.

translation.en: I had no intention of coming back to revisit… this.
translation.es: No tenía ninguna intención de volver a ver esto.

translation.en: Jesus. Okay.
Okay, I've isolated the damaged relays,
so the ship should be able to start repairing itself.
translation.es: así que la nave debería empezar a repararse sola.

translation.en: How long will that take?
Ah, it's at 50% capacity, so hopefully less time than it takes me to heal.
translation.es: Está funcionando al 50 %. Ojalá se recupere más rápido que yo.

translation.en: Wait.
- Do you remember this? - Remember what?
This. Right here, right now.
You being here in 2022?
translation.es: - Estar aquí en 2022. - Sé lo que intentas.

translation.en: - Know where you're going with this. - If this is happening to me--
translation.es: - Estar aquí en 2022. - Sé lo que intentas. - Si me pasó a mí, ya te pasó a ti. - Pierdes tu tiempo.

translation.en: - You're wasting your time. - That means it already happened to you.
translation.es: - Si me pasó a mí, ya te pasó a ti. - Pierdes tu tiempo.

translation.en: Unless it works like a multiverse, where each ripple creates an alternate timeline--
translation.es: O podría ser un multiverso, donde se crean otras líneas.

translation.en: It's not a multiverse!
My God, we watched too many movies.
I just wanna know.
Okay.
Okay, the prevailing wisdom is that when I go back to my fixed time,
translation.es: Bien, lo que se cree es que cuando vuelva a mi época fija,

translation.en: my memory… our memories, they reform, they reconcile.
translation.es: nuestros recuerdos se reformarán y se conciliarán.

translation.en: - But not while I'm here. - Fixed time? What's that?
translation.es: - Pero no si sigo aquí. - ¿Época fija?

translation.en: There's only one place in time where you belong on a quantum level,
translation.es: Cuánticamente, perteneces solo a un lugar temporal,

translation.en: where you're not screwing around with the cosmos like I am.
translation.es: si no paseas por el cosmos como yo.

translation.en: That is your fixed time. Where you actually belong.
translation.es: Esa es tu época fija. Donde realmente perteneces.

translation.en: So by being here and telling me this,
translation.es: Así que, al venir y decirme esto,

translation.en: you may have just changed my whole future?
Honestly? Your future is pretty tragic either way.
translation.es: Bueno, tu futuro ya es bastante trágico.

translation.en: I'm kidding! I'm kidding.
I'm not kidding.
I'm kidding. Let's go. Come on. Here we go.
So what happens now?
Nothin'. I'm just gonna lay down. Let this bullet wound heal.
translation.es: Nada. Me acostaré, dejaré que esta herida sane

translation.en: Think about some key investment opportunities for your future.
translation.es: y analizaré algunas inversiones para tu futuro.

translation.en: - Wait, like Biff from Back to the-- - Are you out of your tiny mind?
translation.es: - ¿Como Biff en Volver al…? - ¿Acaso estás loco?

translation.en: Get back in the house before our mother gets home, and don't make it weird.
translation.es: Ve a casa antes de que llegue mamá. Y no actúes raro.

translation.en: Yes?
- This is amazing. - Isn't it, though?
Mind hitting the light on your way out?
Oh, hey. I'm surprised you're still up.
Well, this night's been full of surprises, mother. That's chilling. What happened?
translation.es: - Pasaron muchas sorpresas. - Qué inquietante. ¿Qué paso?

translation.en: How was your not- a- date? Will you be seeing him again?
translation.es: ¿Cómo estuvo tu no cita? ¿Saldrán de nuevo?

translation.en: - No. I don't know. I don't think so. -
translation.es: No. No lo sé. No lo creo.

translation.en: - Hi. - Hi.
- Me again. - Yes, it is.
You left your scarf in my car.
- I did. Gosh, thanks. - Oh, hey there, kiddo.
Oh. This is my son, Adam. Adam, this is Derek.
translation.es: Este es Adam, mi hijo. Él es Derek.

translation.en: Oh, hey, Adam.
Hello. You have a wonderful mouth mullet. You must be very proud.
translation.es: Hola, debes estar orgulloso de tu barbilla velluda.

translation.en: Oh my gosh, Adam.
- Never heard it called that before. - Well, thanks again.
translation.es: Nunca le habían dicho así. Gracias de nuevo.

translation.en: Sure. See you soon.
Unlikely, but I'll put in a good word for you.
translation.es: No, pero te daré una recomendación.

translation.en: Okay. Okay. I'll see you at work.
translation.es: Bien. Nos vemos en el trabajo.

translation.en: - Yeah. - Bye.
He seems nice.
What?
You can be a real jerk sometimes.
translation.es: A veces puedes ser muy pesado.

translation.en: You know that?
Hey there. Good morning.
Shouldn't you be at work?
Yeah, I need to pay the insurance on the house today.
translation.es: Tengo que pagar el seguro de la casa hoy.

translation.en: Had it in the calendar, but I can't find the statement.
translation.es: Lo anoté en el calendario, pero no hallo el documento.

translation.en: With that filing system?
Shocking. It should all be online.
translation.es: Qué raro. Deberías tenerlo en internet.

translation.en: The minute I find myself with a few extra hours, I will set up those accounts.
translation.es: Apenas tenga tiempo, crearé todas esas cuentas.

translation.en: Until then, this is how your dad did it.
translation.es: Hasta entonces, así lo hacía tu papá.

translation.en: Hey, grab a pile.
Sorry. I gotta get to my room to think about what I've done.
translation.es: Lo siento. Debo ir a mi cuarto a pensar en lo que hice.

translation.en: Okay.
I gotta go.
Call me if you need me.  I won't.
translation.es: - Llámame si me necesitas. - No lo haré.

translation.en: Mom's gone to work.
- Dad's favorite song. - ♪ There's only one thing ♪
translation.es: Es la canción favorita de papá.

translation.en: - ♪ Gonna set you free… ♪ - Yeah, me too.
- ♪ That's my love… ♪ - See, we agreed on something. - Maybe the only thing. - ♪ That's my love… ♪
translation.es: ¿Ves? Concordamos en algo. Quizá sea lo único.

translation.en: - ♪ Let my love open the door… ♪ - What?
- I just… You're… kinda ripped. - ♪ Let my love open the door ♪
translation.es: Nada, es que… eres muy musculoso.

translation.en: - ♪ When everything feels… ♪ - Okay.
Do you work out?
- My genetics don't… - Ever have a thought and not let it out?
Could be fun to just keep it in.
Maybe in the future, there's, like… like, gene therapy or nanotechnology for--
translation.es: Quizá en el futuro tienen terapia génica, nanotecnología o…

translation.en: - Don't do it. Don't… don't do it. - ♪ Let my love open the door ♪
- ♪ Let my love open the door… ♪ - So when does… all this happen.
Does everyone skip leg day in the future?
- ♪ To your heart… ♪ - Does it happen in college?
Oh, wait. Do we get a lot of girls in college?
- I-- - Adam, time travel exists.
translation.es: Adam, se puede viajar en el tiempo.

translation.en: It exists. Isn't that crazy?
Every conceptual idea you have about the universe has just been thrown out the window.
translation.es: Todo lo que sabes del universo acaba de ser desechado,

translation.en: Yet your big question is, Do I get laid?
translation.es: ¿y quieres saber si te acuestas con alguien?

translation.en: - Do I? - Jesus Christ.
- I was just wondering. - Wonder in silence.
translation.es: - Solo me preguntaba. - Hazlo en silencio.

translation.en: - ♪ Let my love open the door ♪ - Oh my God! It's gonna happen!
- Where you goin'? - Drugstore.
I need to get this wound closed up.
You're gonna go dressed like that?
Why don't you wear some of Dad's clothes?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no usas ropa de papá?

translation.en: How long ago was Dad's accident?
About a year and a half ago.
She still hasn't cleaned out his closet.
She's not much of a housekeeper.
translation.es: No es una buena ama de casa.

translation.en: Hey. You have her to take care of you. She has no one. You understand?
translation.es: Oye, ella cuida de ti, pero ella no tiene a nadie, ¿entiendes?

translation.en: Do you understand?
She wakes up every morning with a broken heart and a closet full of his clothes
translation.es: Tiene el corazón roto, un clóset lleno con su ropa

translation.en: and gets nothing from you but a fistful of crap,
translation.es: y un hijo que le responde mal

translation.en: and not even, like, ten seconds of genuine empathy.
translation.es: y un hijo que le responde mal y que tiene cero empatía.

translation.en: I'm you, you know.
Tell me about it.
You know, 30 years, you still get sick to your stomach every time you remember how you treated her now.
translation.es: En 30 años, todavía te sentirás terrible al recordar cómo la tratas ahora.

translation.en: I used to love this jacket.
Dad did too.
I keep waiting to wake up and miss him less,
translation.es: Sigo esperando despertar y extrañarlo menos,

translation.en: but that hasn't happened yet.
Do you still miss him?
Missed him while he was here.
- It's not gonna fit you. - Sure it will.
translation.es: No te quedará. Claro que sí.

translation.en: - - How's the jet?
It's gettin' there.
So the person you came to save is in 2018.
translation.es: Viniste a salvar a alguien en 2018,

translation.en: And somehow, you ended up in 2022. How does that work? You just missed?
translation.es: pero llegaste al 2022. ¿Cómo pasó eso? ¿Te equivocaste?

translation.en: Well, I got shot when I was stealing the plane.
translation.es: Me dispararon mientras robaba el caza.

translation.en: So, uh… I was losin' blood. Ship was comin' apart.
translation.es: Perdí sangre, y el caza se estaba despedazando.

translation.en: I jammed the coordinates. I didn't have time to double- check 'em.
translation.es: No tuve tiempo de confirmar las coordenadas.

translation.en: - Wait, you stole the jet? - It's encoded to me.
So I didn't exactly steal it. I borrowed the shit out of it.
translation.es: Así que no lo robé, solo lo tomé prestado.

translation.en: - There's a difference. Give me some cash. - You don't have money?
translation.es: No es lo mismo. Dame dinero. - ¿No tienes? - No lo usamos en el futuro.

translation.en: - We don't use money in the future. - Really?
translation.es: - ¿No tienes? - No lo usamos en el futuro. ¿En serio?

translation.en: Of course we use money in the future. Stay here.
translation.es: Claro que usamos dinero. Quédate aquí.

translation.en: What's up, Reed?
Crap.
Well, look who we have here.
translation.es: Vaya, miren a quién tenemos acá.

translation.en: Ray, can we just take a break from the ass kicking today?
translation.es: Ray, ¿podemos olvidar las palizas por hoy?

translation.en: I have a lot going on.
Hey, guys. Enjoying our suspension?
I am now.
That's my spleen.
I remember these little turd- burpers.
- Hey, man, we're, uh… just playin' around. - Quiet, Ray. This isn't about you.
translation.es: Solo estamos jugando. Silencio, Ray. Esto no se trata de ti.

translation.en: Hey, what's goin' on? Huh?
Get it together. Ray's ready. You're embarrassing yourself.
So you're not gonna break this up?
God, no. That'd be irresponsible of me.
You'll just figure out some other way to pound the crap out of him. You always do.
translation.es: Solo hallarían otra forma para darle una paliza. Siempre lo hacen.

translation.en: He's got a big mouth. I get it.
Point is, this fight needs to happen right now.
translation.es: El punto es que esta pelea debe ocurrir.

translation.en: So just give us a second, okay, Ray?
Stretch out. You don't wanna pull a hammy.
translation.es: Elonga para que no te lesiones.

translation.en: What are you doing?
Hey, Ray Dollarhyde has been bullying you for years
because you're small, and fragile, and you have a big mouth.
translation.es: porque eres pequeño, frágil y porque hablas mucho.

translation.en: But here's the thing. He doesn't wanna fight.
translation.es: Pero, en verdad, no quiere pelear.

translation.en: - I don't wanna fight either. - He doesn't know that, does he?
So you're gonna walk over there, and you're gonna raise your hands,
translation.es: Así que vas a caminar hacia él, vas a levantar los puños

translation.en: and then you're gonna look Ray right in the eye.
translation.es: y lo vas a mirar directo a los ojos.

translation.en: You're gonna smile in a way that says,
translation.es: Y le dirás con tu sonrisa:

translation.en: I've waited my entire life for this moment.
Like you can't wait to watch his soul exit his body.
translation.es: Como si no pudieras esperar a ver cómo su alma deja su cuerpo.

translation.en: Then you're gonna drop to your knees and punch him hard in the private bathing suit parts.
translation.es: Luego te arrodillarás y le pegarás en las partes privadas.

translation.en: - I'm sorry, the what now? - Ah! Are we gonna smoke this banana?
translation.es: ¿En las qué? ¿Vamos a pelar esta banana o seguir hablando de ella? ¡Vamos!

translation.en: Or are we gonna talk about it all day? Let's go, go, go, go, go.
translation.es: ¿Vamos a pelar esta banana o seguir hablando de ella? ¡Vamos!

translation.en: I'm gonna smoke your banana, motherf--
translation.es: Me voy a fumar tu banana, hijo de…

translation.en: No, no, no, no! No. That… that's not what we talked about.
translation.es: ¡No! Eso no es lo que hablamos.

translation.en: - - Boom!  Oh yeah!
- Nice, man. - You crying, Reed?
Oh no, Chuck. Look, we made him cry.
It's like he was trying to lose.
Run away, Reed!
- What the hell? - I'm not supposed to do this.
Ever hear the expression, Every bully has a bully?
translation.es: ¿Has oído que todo matón tiene un matón?

translation.en: Yours isn't holding up his end of the bargain, so I'm gonna take over.
translation.es: El tuyo se fue, así que yo me haré cargo.

translation.en: - What are you talking about? -
You're a good fighter. You like to kick ass. You're a big kid.
translation.es: Eres bueno para pelear y eres grande.

translation.en: But if you go near Adam again, I'll know, and I will find you, Ray.
translation.es: Pero, si vuelves a acercarte a Adam, lo sabré y te encontraré.

translation.en: And it won't be like a couple of kids in a playground scrap.
translation.es: Y no será como una pelea de niños en el parque.

translation.en: I will pull bones out of your body.
I will sharpen them.
- I will use them to stab little Chuckie. - What did I do?
translation.es: - Y los usaré para apuñalar a Chuckie. - ¿Qué hice?

translation.en: Shut your mouth, or I'll fill it with Ray's feet.
translation.es: Cállate o te comerás los pies de Ray.

translation.en: You understand what I'm saying? Got all of it? The bones? - Yeah. - Your feet in Chuckie's mouth?
translation.es: ¿Entendiste bien? ¿Los huesos, tus pies en la boca de Chuckie?

translation.en: - - Good. Are you peeing right now? - Yeah. - You're a real streamer.
translation.es: Bien. ¿Te estás meando? Vaya, tenías bastante guardado.

translation.en: Get yourself home and clean yourself up.
Be the change you wanna see, okay?
translation.es: Sé el cambio que quieres ver, ¿sí?

translation.en: God, I hated those assholes.
Oh, come on.
Hey, Adam.
Get out of my stuff and open the door.
translation.es: Deja mis cosas y abre la puerta.

translation.en: Put the drone down. It will kill us both.
translation.es: Baja el dron. Nos matará a ambos.

translation.en: Hey, look, you lost one fight. I figured you'd be used to that by now.
translation.es: Perdiste una pelea. Supuse que ya estarías acostumbrado.

translation.en: You coulda helped. You just stood there.
translation.es: Podrías haber ayudado. No hiciste nada.

translation.en: Christ. You're so sensitive.
Hey, you had to lose that fight.
translation.es: Oye, tenías que perder esa pelea.

translation.en: You had to. Trust me.
You don't go from bein' you to bein' me without gettin' your ass kicked,
translation.es: No te convertirás en mí sin que te den una paliza

translation.en: a lot, all the time.
I'm sorry if I went too far today.
Shouldn't have done that.
- Who's this? - Who's who?
Put that back.
You put that back.
As soon as you tell me who she is.
translation.es: En cuanto me digas quién es.

translation.en: That's my wife, Laura.
We have a wife?
No, we do not have a wife anymore.
- Hey. - Hi.
- Aah. Hi, there. How are you? - Hey, Paul.
Been a while.
Yep, how you doin'? That baby sleeping yet?
translation.es: Sí, ¿cómo estás? ¿Tu bebé ya está durmiendo?

translation.en: Uh, not really. No.
No. Well, you'll miss those days when they're gone.
translation.es: Extrañarás esos días cuando se acaben.

translation.en: Ah, I find that hard to believe.
Believe it. Babies are pure love.
translation.es: Créelo. Los bebés son amor puro.

translation.en: They grow into teenagers, who grow into be assassins of happiness.
translation.es: Pero se convierten en adolescentes que acaban con la felicidad.

translation.en: Thank you, thank you.
Mm, well, somethin' to look forward to.
translation.es: Bueno, ya espero que me pase eso.

translation.en: Sorry. It's been a rough day.
translation.es: Lo siento. Tuve un día difícil.

translation.en: Year. Couple of years.
Hmm. Your boy still havin' a hard time?
He hates me.
It's not his fault. He's… he's just dealing.
translation.es: No es su culpa. Es solo su forma de lidiar con todo.

translation.en: It's fine. We'll be fine. It's good. Good, good, good.
translation.es: Está bien. Estaremos bien. Todo está bien.

translation.en: I wish I knew what I was doin' wrong.
You're not doin' anything wrong.
Sorry.
- I'm sorry. - Sorry, you scared me.
- I was eavesdropping. I'm sorry. - Yeah.
You're right, though. Teenage boys are horrible.
It's like living with a urinal cake that yells at you.
translation.es: Son como pastillas de urinario que te gritan.

translation.en: Mothers are usually the ones who take the hit.
translation.es: Las madres suelen recibir lo peor.

translation.en: Yeah.
- But I'll tell you somethin'. - Mmm?
Boys always come back for their mamas.
translation.es: los niños siempre vuelven con su mamá.

translation.en: That's nice.
It sounds like you're speaking from experience.
I am.
You have a good mom? - I do. - Oh.
I have the best mom.
Good.
I hope you're right.
I'm still researching boarding schools in Fallujah, so…
translation.es: Pero seguiré buscando internados en Faluya.

translation.en: - Good. -
No, I don't mean that. He's such a sweet kid.
translation.es: No, no lo digo en serio. Es un niño muy tierno.

translation.en: I'm crazy about him.
We lost his dad in a car accident year before last.
translation.es: Su padre falleció en un accidente de auto hace un año.

translation.en: Yeah. That's tough.
Yeah. You have no idea.
Well, I have some idea.
- Oh, sorry. - Sorry.
Jinx.
- Thank you. - Thank you.
Aren't you grieving too?
- Yeah. - Yeah.
I am. Of course I am.
So tell him.
You should tell him.
I don't think he needs it.
You think you're being strong for him,
and the problem with acting like you have it all together is…
translation.es: pero el problema con actuar así

translation.en: he believes it.
translation.es: es que él se lo cree.

translation.en: Maybe he needs to know that you don't.
translation.es: Quizá necesita saber que no es así.

translation.en: It's okay if you don't.
My husband had a jacket just like that.
translation.es: Mi esposo tenía una chaqueta así.

translation.en: Oh, this is a classic.
Yeah.
It was really nice chatting with you. I'll see you later.
translation.es: Fue muy agradable conversar contigo. Nos vemos luego.

translation.en: Oh, hey, um…
he doesn't hate you.
He loves you.
More than he knows.
Hey! Hey!
Locked and docked.
Start the area scans for his jet. Let's find him and get the hell outta here.
translation.es: Busca su caza en el área. Hallémoslo y vámonos de aquí.

translation.en: Find him.
- So you came back for your wife, Laura? - We're not getting into that.
translation.es: - ¿Regresaste por tu esposa? - No hablaremos de eso.

translation.en: Hey, she's my wife too.
- You know what? We should get into that. - Thank you.
translation.es: - ¿Sabes? Sí deberíamos hablar de eso. - Gracias.

translation.en: Met in the academy.
She was 20 minutes late to the wrong classroom
translation.es: Llegó 20 minutos tarde al aula y edificio equivocados.

translation.en: in the wrong building.
I offered to walk her to the right one, and…
translation.es: Le ofrecí acompañarla a su aula

translation.en: man, I was all in before we even made it outside.
translation.es: y me enamoré de ella incluso antes de salir.

translation.en: A couple of years ago, she didn't come back from a jump.
translation.es: Hace un par de años, no regresó de un salto.

translation.en: They told me her jet broke up on reentry, but she was the best pilot in the program.
translation.es: Dijeron que su caza explotó al reentrar, pero era la mejor piloto.

translation.en: She wrote the book on reentry. Didn't make sense.
translation.es: Dominaba la reentrada a la atmósfera. No tenía sentido.

translation.en: And you were trying to get to 2018 'cause that's where she went before?
translation.es: ¿Y querías llegar al 2018 porque ella fue a ese año?

translation.en: Yeah.
- What was she doing there? - I don't know.
They changed the jump logs.
Somebody was hidin' somethin'.
Maybe she saw something Sorian didn't want her to see.
translation.es: Quizá vio algo que Sorian no quería que viera.

translation.en: Wait, Sorian? Maya Sorian, Dad's partner?
- She was always so nice to me. - Hmm.
Yeah, trust me. She's no friend.
translation.es: Sí, confía en mí. No es nuestra amiga.

translation.en: Nope.
After Dad died, she got rich off of his tech.
translation.es: Se hizo rica con la tecnología de papá.

translation.en: Bought all the right people.
Next thing you know, she has exclusive control over the most valuable resource on Earth,
translation.es: y obtuvo el control del recurso más preciado del mundo:

translation.en: time.
Wait a minute. You're saying Dad invented time travel?
translation.es: Espera un poco. ¿Dices que papá inventó el viaje en el tiempo?

translation.en: Yeah. Not on purpose.
The magnetic particle accelerator. Remember that?
He called it The Adam Project.
Yeah, or as I like to call it, his favorite child.
translation.es: O como me gusta llamarlo: su hijo favorito.

translation.en: So what happened to Laura?
Mmm. Well, I think your nice friend Maya had her killed.
translation.es: Creo que tu amiga Maya la mató.

translation.en: - What? - Yeah.
That's why I gotta get back to 2018 as soon as possible.
translation.es: Por eso debo volver al 2018. El caza está casi listo.

translation.en: The jet's almost ready. I'll lay low in the shed.
translation.es: Por eso debo volver al 2018. El caza está casi listo. Me ocultaré, descansaré un poco hasta obtener una señal

translation.en: I'll heal for a few more days until I can get a clean read
translation.es: Me ocultaré, descansaré un poco hasta obtener una señal

translation.en: and then fly out of your life.
translation.es: y me iré de tu vida.

translation.en: But going back to save her. - Talking to me. -
translation.es: Pero regresar para salvarla, conversar conmigo

translation.en: Everything you're doing right now just to rescue one person.
translation.es: y todo lo que estás haciendo para rescatarla cambiará el futuro.

translation.en: You're changing the future. That's gotta be against the rules.
translation.es: y todo lo que estás haciendo para rescatarla cambiará el futuro. ¿No hay reglas contra eso?

translation.en: You'll feel differently when you meet her.
- And when you lose her. - What?
Grab that bag. Get ready to run.
translation.es: ¿Qué? Toma ese bolso. Prepárate para correr.

translation.en: Why? What's happening?
We're going that way. Be ready.
- Move! -
Stay behind me.
Don't you do it! Don't you do it, Reed!
Wanna see something cool?
- That's a lightsaber, dude. - Quiet now.
translation.es: - Es un sable de luz. - Silencio.

translation.en: Time to go. Let's go.
Hello, Adam.
Reed, don't move!
Christos. They'll let anyone into this time stream.
translation.es: Christos. Dejan entrar a cualquiera a esta línea del tiempo.

translation.en: Who's that?
That's Christos. We were in the academy together.
translation.es: Es Christos. Fuimos a la academia juntos.

translation.en: He's a decent pilot but a terrible person. He runs security for Sorian.
translation.es: Buen piloto, terrible persona. Dirige la seguridad de Sorian.

translation.en: Ouchie, with the face. Did I do that?
translation.es: Ay, ¿qué te pasó en la cara? ¿Fui yo?

translation.en: God, I hope the boss lets me kill you.
translation.es: Cielos, espero que la jefa me deje matarte.

translation.en: In fairness, though, you did shoot me first.
On the bright side, your… your face now matches your soul.
translation.es: Lo bueno es que tu cara ahora combina con tu alma.

translation.en: - Anyone say you talk too much? - All the time.
- It's come up. - That's enough.
Adam, before this goes any further, let's just go home, please.
translation.es: Adam, antes de pasar a mayores, regresemos a casa, por favor.

translation.en: Uh, no!
Just… just no.
So you're risking your own young life
over some paranoid delusion that I somehow killed Laura.
translation.es: por la loca idea de que maté a Laura?

translation.en: I loved Laura. You were both like family to me.
translation.es: Adoraba a Laura. Ustedes dos eran como mi familia.

translation.en: I would never have hurt her. I hate that it's come to this.
translation.es: Nunca la hubiera lastimado. Odio tener que llegar a esto.

translation.en: Guns.
Christos, please escort Adam back to 2050.
translation.es: Christos, escolta a Adam al 2050, por favor.

translation.en: - You're up. - Yeah. All right, drop the Mag- Cyl.
translation.es: - Te toca. - Sí. Suelta el Mag-Cyl.

translation.en: - This? - Yeah.
- Yeah. Okay. - All right.
Wanna start low or go high?
- Stop! Get off him! -
- - Come here!
- Move! - ♪ I was told what it means ♪
- What is happening? - Dying outside your fixed time is messy.
translation.es: ¿Qué está pasando? Morir fuera de tu época fija es enredado.

translation.en: - What are you doing here? - Saving your ass, honey. Behind you!
translation.es: ¿Qué haces aquí? Te estoy salvando. ¡Detrás de ti!

translation.en: I can't believe…
- I can't believe you're here. - ♪ Good times, bad times ♪
- Hey. - Hi.
That was awesome.
- We should go. - Yep. Let's go. Come on, come on, come on!
Go. Go!
I knew you'd come someday. I just didn't know when.
translation.es: Sabía que vendrías, pero no cuándo.

translation.en: Of course I came.
Eyes on the road, please.
They said you lit up on reentry.
That's crap. I have the top reentry stats in the program.
translation.es: Sí, claro. Soy la mejor del programa.

translation.en: - Oh yeah. -
Laura, this is… me.
- Hi. - Parallel contact, babe?
Well, you've always said that you wished you'd met me earlier.
translation.es: Siempre dijiste que desearías haberme conocido antes. Aquí estoy.

translation.en: - Here I am. - Yeah.
translation.es: Siempre dijiste que desearías haberme conocido antes. Aquí estoy. Sí.

translation.en: All right, can we maybe slow down a bit now? There's no one even following us.
translation.es: ¿Podemos ir más despacio? Nadie nos está siguiendo.

translation.en: Don't look back. Look up.
Gotta get off this road. We're too exposed.
Okay, baby, it's about to get busier.
translation.es: Cariño, esto se pondrá más difícil.

translation.en: Go, go, go, go, go, go, go!
Stop the car.
- What? - What?
- Stop! -
Okay, back, back. Go, go, go! Reverse!
Back! Back!
Go, go, go, go!
They're leaving.
They're not leaving. They're regrouping.
- We have to get off this road fast. - What road?
translation.es: - Debemos salir de este camino. - ¿Qué camino?

translation.en: I… I don't understand. How did you find us?
You don't think I'd be watching your back, even in the past?
translation.es: ¿No creíste que te cuidaría incluso en el pasado?

translation.en: Why did you make the jump back in the first place?
I was analyzing data when I found something strange in the jump logs.
translation.es: Descubrí algo raro en los registros de salto:

translation.en: A time jet returning from 2018.
translation.es: un caza temporal que volvió del 2018.

translation.en: How's that strange?
Because no one ever flew to 2018.
I don't get it. How did it come back if it never left?
translation.es: No entiendo. ¿Cómo regresó si nunca se fue?

translation.en: Unless someone went back and altered the time stream,
translation.es: Quizá alguien fue y alteró la línea del tiempo,

translation.en: so the future the jet had left from had already been changed.
translation.es: y eso cambió el futuro del que partió el caza.

translation.en: God, it's like I traded my brains for those muscles.
translation.es: Es como si hubiera cambiado mi cerebro por músculos.

translation.en: It's a shit deal.
- Cute kid. - Precious, isn't he?
Don't you just wanna hold him underwater till the bubbles stop?
- - Oh, I freakin' hate myself.
How did this happen?
That jet that went back? It was Sorian's.
translation.es: El caza que regresó era de Sorian.

translation.en: She went back to November 2018 for a reason.
translation.es: Volvió a noviembre del 2018 por una razón.

translation.en: What happened in November 2018?
I'll tell ya.
This happened. Your father's magnetic particle accelerator,
translation.es: Esto pasó. El acelerador de partículas magnético de tu papá,

translation.en: The Adam Project, had just gone online.
translation.es: el proyecto Adam, empezó a funcionar.

translation.en: That was the first step toward practical time travel.
translation.es: Fue el primer paso para viajar en el tiempo.

translation.en: Sorian must've come back to 2018
and given her younger self some kind of future intel.
translation.es: para darse a sí misma información del futuro.

translation.en: What for?
My guess is enough future stock tips to amass her fortune
translation.es: Para comprar acciones, aumentar su fortuna,

translation.en: and get rid of whatever political obstacles were keeping her from gaining control of the time program.
translation.es: eliminar obstáculos políticos y tener control total sobre el programa.

translation.en: She already had that.
But did she?
No, she didn't.
So this world, our world,
translation.es: Así que este mundo, nuestro mundo,

translation.en: everything has already been changed by Sorian.
translation.es: todo ya fue cambiado por Sorian.

translation.en: And your fixed time, 2050, is it bad there?
translation.es: Y tu época fija en 2050, ¿es mala?

translation.en: - We've seen Terminator, right? - Obviously.
That's 2050 on a good day.
translation.es: Así es un buen día en 2050.

translation.en: Sorian must've spotted me and planted an altitude bomb on my jet.
translation.es: Seguro Sorian me descubrió y colocó una bomba en mi caza.

translation.en: Here, eat something.
- I managed to eject, but it didn't matter. -
translation.es: Logré eyectar, pero eso no importó porque quedé atrapada aquí sin mi caza.

translation.en: Without my jet, I was a permanent castaway.
translation.es: porque quedé atrapada aquí sin mi caza.

translation.en: So I had to follow protocol, you know, live out my life here,
translation.es: Así que seguí el protocolo y continué mi vida aquí.

translation.en: avoid contact, minimize my footprint, and hope you were crazy enough to come look for me.
translation.es: Me mantuve oculta y esperé que tu locura te hiciera venir por mí.

translation.en: Alone. All this time.
Four years.
That's the job, right?
- Yeah, but, baby-- - It's…
It's fine. I got used to being alone.
translation.es: Todo está bien. Me acostumbré a la soledad.

translation.en: Not anymore.
- - Hey.
I found you.
- - I found you.
You found me.
- I'll take my eyes and ears for a walk. - Bye now.
translation.es: - Iré a dar un paseo. - Adiós.

translation.en: You kids have fun.
- Hey. - Hi.
- What's wrong? - I got shot.
- You got shot? - By a gun, yeah.
- Reed? - Yeah?
- Suck it up. - Yes, ma'am.
Yes, boss.
- You know what you have to do. - Nooooo.
translation.es: - Sabes lo que tienes que hacer. - No.

translation.en: No, I came back for you.
I know.
But we can't have a life here. Not like this.
translation.es: Pero no podemos tener una vida aquí. No así.

translation.en: Now you have to go back to 2018, and you have to put things right.
translation.es: Ahora tienes que volver al 2018 y arreglar las cosas.

translation.en: - You have to put an end to all this. - What do you mean put an end to it?
translation.es: - Tienes que acabar con todo esto. - ¿A qué te refieres?

translation.en: I mean, stop time travel
translation.es: Tienes que detener el descubrimiento del viaje en el tiempo

translation.en: from ever being invented and save the future.
translation.es: Tienes que detener el descubrimiento del viaje en el tiempo y salvar el futuro.

translation.en: Fine, come with me, and we'll--
Your jet is meshed for your DNA. It won't fly with anyone else.
translation.es: Tu caza está codificado a tu ADN. Nadie más puede usarlo.

translation.en: - You're smart. You can figure it out. - Adam!
We meet in the program. We meet there. Do you understand that? We can't…
translation.es: Nos conocemos en el programa. ¿Entiendes eso? No podemos…

translation.en: If I go back and stop time travel,
and that's an extremely big if with Sorian on my ass,
translation.es: lo que será difícil con Sorian persiguiéndome,

translation.en: we never meet.
We never happen.
We never happen, Laura.
We did happen.
Every moment we ever had will always have happened.
translation.es: Cada momento que compartimos siempre habrá sucedido.

translation.en: Even if we correct the time stream,
translation.es: Incluso si corregimos la línea del tiempo,

translation.en: somewhere in us will be the echo of this one.
translation.es: en algún lugar de nosotros estará el eco de esta.

translation.en: And we will find each other.
I really believe that.
What if we don't? What if… what if you're wrong? And you're probably wrong.
translation.es: ¿Y si estás equivocada? Y probablemente lo estés.

translation.en: When am I ever wrong?
- Hey, hey. - I can't do this again, okay?
translation.es: Oye, no puedo pasar por esto otra vez.

translation.en: I can't do this again, please. I can't afford to lose you. Don't do this.
translation.es: No puedo volver a perderte. Por favor. No hagas esto.

translation.en: What is that?
They found us.
Damn it!
There's a dirt road around the bend.

Dad.

oh my God, oh my God, oh my God, oh my God, oh my God,

You can't be here.

Will you please just stop talking? Everything you asked me to do.

translation.es: El solo impacto ambiental de las compañías que me hiciste elegir

Where you going?
You seeing someone?

all that loneliness,
all that loneliness,

I'm back
